basics.name: Seongjae Lee
basics.label: Ph.D. Student
basics.summary: An undergraduate student with expertise in biomedical engineering, medical device development, and real-time system design.

work.name: Bagelcode Inc.
work.position: Research Assistant Intern, Strategy & Finance Team
work.summary: Assisted in preliminary listing review requests and introduced Employee Stock Ownership Plans (ESOP).

work.name: Pohang Youngshin High School
work.summary: As an external guest teacher, I taught 'Advanced Life Science' and 'Life Science Laboratory' courses as part of a specialized class program at the high school.

volunteer.summary: Planned and managed residential college activities, dormitory management, and mentoring students.
highlights: Awarded as Best Advisor at Residential College Advisor Awards(RCAA).

volunteer.summary: Modified curriculum for freshmen, organized and conducted departmental events, and successfully reorganized student activities after COVID-19 as the department's student council president.
Provided mentorship in Programming & Problem solving(CSED101).

education.institution: POSTECH, Pohang University of Science and Technology

publications.name: Shuffled ECA-Net for stress detection from multimodal wearable sensor data
publications.summary: Introduced a novel Shuffled ECA-Net model for detecting stress using multimodal wearable sensor data, integrating attention mechanisms and sensor fusion techniques.

publications.name: Automated Arrhythmia Classification System: Proof-of-Concept With Lightweight Model on an Ultra-Edge Device
publications.summary: Developed an automated arrhythmia classification system using a lightweight model on ultra-edge devices, showcasing advancements in edge computing and model compression techniques.

references.name: Professor Sung-Min Park
references.reference: Research Advisor at Innovative Medical Solution Lab, POSTECH.

projects.name: Pain Related Spinal Cord Neuron Activity Decoding using Deep Learning
projects.summary: Developing deep learning model for decoding pain related spinal cord neuron activity.

projects.name: LLM-based Glucose Index Prediction System
projects.summary: Developing LLM-based glucose index prediction system which can be used for both diabetic patient and non-diabetic people.

projects.name: Personalized PPGR dection algorithm and LLM-based Nutrient Management System
projects.summary: Developing personalized PPGR dection algorithm and LLM-based nutrient management system.

projects.name: Real-Time Arrhythmia Classification System
projects.summary: Developed lightweight model on ultra-edge sensors for real-time arrhythmia classification.
highlights: Quantization and lightweight Wavelet-CNN model development

projects.name: FPGA-based Edge Computing System
projects.summary: Designed FPGA-based edge computing system for arrhythmia detection.
highlights: Developed simple CNN on PYNQ-Z2 board
Modified DNN to BNN using Xilinx's FINN framework
